alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 315 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over The Hammocks, or near Kendall, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Homestead Miami Speedway, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Kendall, Doral, Sweetwater, Florida City, Homestead Base, Westchester, Naranja, Richmond West, Fountainbleau, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Leisure City, Zoo Miami, Goulds and The Hammocks. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
